name: Cashflow Supervision
description:
After this character takes DMG or is healed: This character's next Normal Attack this Round costs 1 less Unaligned Element and deals +1 DMG. (Max 2 times per Round)
(Only Catalyst Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After this character takes DMG or is healed:</color> This character's next <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color> this Round costs 1 less $[K309] and deals +1 DMG. (Max 2 times per Round)\n(<color=#FFFFFFFF>Only {SPRITE_PRESET#3201}Catalyst Characters</color> can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After this character takes DMG or is healed:</color> This character's next <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color> this Round costs 1 less <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1109}Unaligned Element</color> and deals +1 DMG. (Max 2 times per Round)\n(<color=#FFFFFFFF>Only {SPRITE_PRESET#3201}Catalyst Characters</color> can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon)
storytext:
"The overseer made of precision machinery rumbles as it observes the monetary flow of the tiny nation,
Tirelessly recording the movement of every amount of money, the savings and spending of all,
The changes in value, and the number of times each piece of currency is circulated over a specific period."
